snippet: A Brooklyn mother was sentenced to 32 years to life in prison despite her claim that she was not responsible for her child’s death because she lacked the skills and money to properly care for her.
abstract: Carlotta Brett-Pierce is sentenced to 32 years to life in prison; she was convicted of murder in the death of her 4-year-old daughter, Marchella Pierce.
lead_paragraph: A Brooklyn mother was sentenced to 32 years to life in prison despite her claim that she was not responsible for her child’s death because she lacked the skills and money to properly care for her.

headline.seo: Mother Gets Prison Term in Marchella Pierce’s Death
headline.main: Prison Term for Mother of a Girl, 4, Found Dead
headline.print_headline: Prison Term For Mother Of a Girl, 4, Found Dead
